content:
Scenario: Protection from discrimination based on single parent status
    Given single parents often face workplace discrimination and bias
    And employers may view them as less committed or reliable
    When Maria experiences workplace treatment
    Then the workplace_elohim should monitor for single parent discrimination
    And it should document patterns that indicate bias
    And it should support Maria in addressing discriminatory treatment
    And single parent status should be protected from workplace discrimination
    And Maria should have equal opportunity regardless of family structure
